hero.title: ECSCS Soccer Tournament 2026
hero.subtitle: Join us in celebrating 30 years of Ethiopian community sports, culture, and unity in Edmonton. A weekend of soccer, music, food, and family fun!

about.title: About the Tournament
about.description: The ECSCS Soccer Tournament brings together the Ethiopian community and friends for an exciting celebration of sport and culture.
about.historyText: For three decades, the Ethiopian Community Sports and Cultural Society has been fostering unity, promoting Ethiopian heritage, and building lasting friendships through the beautiful game of soccer. What started as a small community gathering has grown into one of Edmonton's most anticipated cultural sporting events.
